alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 10:20AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Orange and northwestern Osceola Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1019 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intercession City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kissimmee, Bay Lake, Celebration, West Lake Toho and Intercession City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
